title: Changing the root-path with a QUARKUS_HTTP_ROOT_PATH environment doesn't work
body:
### Describe the bug

When the command is executed
java -jar target/quarkus-app/quarkus-run.jar is not overridden value of quarkus.http.root-path with environment variable QUARKUS_HTTP_ROOT_PATH.

Displays the error:

2022-09-03 14:12:46,719 WARN [io.qua.run.con.ConfigRecorder] (Thread-0) Build time property cannot be changed at runtime:
  -quarkus.http.root-path is set to '/output' but it is build time fixed to '/'. Did you change the quarkus.http.root-path property after building the application?

### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

Report the env QUARKUS_HTTP_ROOT_PATH

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`
